subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mariners were 26-47 and 17 ½ games out of the American League West lead after they won, 10-2, against Atlanta on Friday night in the managerial debut of Jim Riggleman.
snippet: The Mariners were 26-47 and 17 ½ games out of the American League West lead after they won, 10-2, against Atlanta on Friday night in the managerial debut of Jim Riggleman.
